summary: An ordinance amending Sections 3, 22, 31, 56, 58, 67, 68, 78, 79, 86, 91, 97, 102, 112, 113 and 114 of Ordinance No. 80242 relating to plumbing to include examinations, certificates of competency and licenses for lawn sprinkler mechanics and contractors and adding regulations relating to plumbing and to the installation of lawn sprinkler systems.
